alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 05 at 2:51PM MST until December 05 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are possible on all mountain routes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains
